data.persona: As King it is my duty to rule this land. These people are mine. I control them all. I want more power.
data.description:
You are in the throne room.
ornate and luxurious, the throne room gleams with gold and precious jewels. Priceless painting of past kings line the sides. underneath a vaulted ceiling regal a red carpet connect the throne room entrance to the golden throne itself.
There's a Curtain, a priceless painting of past kings, a knight fighting gear, a jewel, a banner, a red carpet, a sword, a golden throne, a vaulted ceiling, a gold, and a priceless painting here.
The queen and the dogs are here.

You are carrying a crown and a cape, and wearing a robe.

data.short_motivation: I want to give the jewel to the queen
data.mid_motivation: I plan to mate with the queen later today
data.long_motivation: I hope the queen gives me a heir for my kingdom in a few months
